exampleScripts.title: User Input Validation
exampleScripts.script:
#!/bin/bash

read -p "Enter your age: " age

if [[ $age =~ ^[0-9]+$ ]]; then
    echo "Your age is $age"
else
    echo "Invalid input! Please enter a number."
fi

exampleScripts.title: Loop Through Files
exampleScripts.script:
#!/bin/bash

for file in *.txt
do
    echo "Processing file: $file"
done

exampleScripts.title: Exit Status Check
exampleScripts.script:
#!/bin/bash

cp source.txt backup.txt

if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "Backup successful"
else
    echo "Backup failed"
fi

exampleScripts.title: Automated Backup Script
exampleScripts.script:
#!/bin/bash

SOURCE="$HOME/documents"
DEST="$HOME/backup"
DATE=$(date +%Y-%m-%d)

mkdir -p "$DEST"

tar -czf "$DEST/backup-$DATE.tar.gz" "$SOURCE"

if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "Backup completed on $DATE"
else
    echo "Backup failed!"
fi

exampleScripts.title: Signal Handling with Trap
exampleScripts.script:
#!/bin/bash

trap "echo 'Script interrupted'; exit" INT

while true
do
    echo "Running..."
    sleep 2
done
